info.title: Alai API
info.description: Transform text content into fully designed presentations

post.description: Creates a new presentation from the provided text content and customization options. All parameters are passed as a JSON object in the `data` field.

data.description:
JSON object with the following structure:

**Required:**
- `input_text` (string): Main content for presentation

**Optional:**
- `additional_instructions` (string): Custom AI instructions

**presentation_options:**
- `title` (string): Presentation title
- `theme_id`: FLAT_WHITE | DESERT_BLOOM | LAPIS_DAWN | EMERALD_FOREST | COSMIC_THREAD | DONUT | OAK | OBSIDIAN_FLOW | MIDNIGHT_EMBER | AURORA_FLUX
- `slide_range`: auto | 1 | 2-5 | 6-10 | 11-15 | 16-20 | 21-25
- `choices_per_slide`: 1 | 2 | 3 | 4

**text_options:**
- `language`: English (US) | English (UK) | Spanish (Latin America) | Spanish (Mexico) | Spanish (Spain) | French | German | Italian | Portuguese (Brazil) | Portuguese (Portugal) | Dutch | Polish | Russian | Japanese | Korean | Chinese (Simplified) | Hindi | Swedish | Norwegian | Danish | Finnish | Greek | Turkish | Czech | Hungarian | Romanian | Bulgarian | Ukrainian | Vietnamese | Thai | Indonesian
- `tone`: DEFAULT | PROFESSIONAL | CASUAL | TECHNICAL | EDUCATIONAL | INSPIRATIONAL | NARRATIVE | PERSUASIVE | AUTHORITATIVE | EMPATHETIC | CUSTOM
- `tone_instructions` (string): Required when tone is CUSTOM
- `content_mode`: preserve | enhance | condense | custom
- `content_instructions` (string): Required when content_mode is custom
- `amount_mode`: minimal | essential | balanced | detailed | custom
- `amount_instructions` (string): Required when amount_mode is custom

**image_options:**
- `include_ai_images` (boolean): default true
- `style`: auto | realistic | artistic | cartoon | three_d | custom
- `style_instructions` (string): Required when style is custom

presentation_url.description: Direct URL to view the generated presentation

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

bearerAuth.description: API key passed as Bearer token
